Package info.bobkirby.valve

Highly configurable Filter and Valves log access server database rows for each HTTP access.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JDBCAccessLogFilter.ParamSetup Action to setup an initialization that includes a parameter.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.Warner Use org.apache.catalina.Valve implementation to output warnings in a standard way when a ServletContext is unavailable, such as during Valve configuration, without having to use java.lang.System.err, which is the output technique of last resort.
 

Class Summary
EE7JDBCAccessLogFilter A wrapper for JDBCAccessLogFilter that avoids reflection when a few operationally important values of HTTP queries are exposed with later versions of the javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse interface.
FacadeJDBCAccessLogFilter A wrapper for JDBCAccessLogFilter that avoids reflection when a few operationally important values of HTTP queries are exposed.
JDBCAccessLogFilter This highly configurable Filter produces database rows for each HTTP access.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoArrayString Abstract class converts request and response values into an array of String column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoArrayStringClob Abstract class converts request and response values into a CLOB column values representing a arrays of Strings for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoBoolean Abstract class converts request and response values into Boolean column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoInteger Abstract class converts request and response values into Integer column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoLong Abstract class converts request and response values into Long column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoShort Abstract class converts request and response values into Short column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoString Abstract class converts request and response values into possibly truncated String column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoStringClob Abstract class converts request and response values into possibly truncated CLOB column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoText Abstract class converts request and response values into, possibly truncated with an ellipsis String, String column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoTextClob Abstract class converts request and response values into, possibly truncated with an ellipsis String, CLOB column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoTimestamp Abstract class converts request and response values into Timestamp column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogFilter.DoValue Abstract class converts request and response values into column values for insertion via JDBC into an access log.
JDBCAccessLogValve This Tomcat Valve replaces an older org.apache.catalina.valves.JDBCAccessLogValve, allowing most of the simple values associated with processing an HTTP query to be logged to a relational database management systems (RDMS) as selected.
ResponseJDBCAccessLogValve An extension of JDBCAccessLogValve that avoids reflection when a few operationally important values of HTTP queries are exposed to the Valves getting org.apache.catalina.connector.Response.
 

Enum Summary
JDBCAccessLogFilter.NumericReturnType  
 

Package info.bobkirby.valve Description

Highly configurable Filter and Valves log access server database rows for each HTTP access. JDBCAccessLogFilter explains in detail.

Depending on which libraries and patches are available, some source files may not compile, which expected when supporting multiple versions.

  • FacadeJDBCAccessLogFilter may only work as a Filter with older versions of JBoss or its Tomcat, where org.apache.catalina.connector.ResponseFacade did not expose several useful values and had Response names for those values that are different from those used in Java EE 7 and later.
  • ResponseJDBCAccessLogValve may only work as a Valve with older versions of JBoss or its Tomcat, where org.apache.catalina.connector.ResponseFacade did not expose several useful values and had Response names for those values that are different from those used in Java EE 7 and later.
  • EE7JDBCAccessLogFilter may only work with environments that support Java EE 7 or later due to javax.servlet.http.* interface name changes.

Use Java 1.5 (Java 5) or later to compile since the code has generics. Communicate with a SQL3 or higher relational management database system (RDBMS) for many features.
